name: Permission Slip-Up
description: Have you ever wanted to live out your dreams of being a sociologist? Yeah I bet you have. Luckily for you, now after a million years of civilization evolving year after year, you can now have one of the most unique experiences in pokemon history. Play as Ann the nidoran as you explore the depths of your home and meet a variety of people that consider themselves your friends and family but are ultimately just another obstacle in the path to your education.
